name: Nightwalk (sreal)
description:
Though this is not really a 'game', more of a bunch trying new stuff.

  - raycasting for movement instead of relying on physics, still pretty janky. Press down. I dare you.
  - pixel art that's ok for a first time using a program
  - animations connected to velocity and also the footstep sound effects.
  - shader for the darkness

*Still tho, please try it!!*
Load the review rockets and fire away.
Any feedback is great, especially about the animation on the old lady, or programming stories you have about getting raycast movement working.

### [FEEDBACK/VOTE HERE](https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/nightwalk)

# Controls

Default Unity controller input, so...

  - **keyboard/gamepad directions** for *movement*
  - **Control/Button 1/A/x** to *begin*

..and the often forgotten...

  - **escape** to *quit from this horrible experience and go and review a different game*
